H0.text: Magnetic force is the term for the force that a magnet exerts on certain materials.

H1.text: Positive force is the term for the force that a magnet exerts on certain materials.

H2.text: Gravitational force is the term for the force that a magnet exerts on certain materials.

H3.text: Potential force is the term for the force that a magnet exerts on certain materials.

A4.text: the field, in turn, imparts magnetic forces on other particles that are in the fields
